name: Sharpshooter's Oath

refinement_effect.refine_one: Increases DMG against weak spots by 24%.
refinement_effect.refine_two: Increases DMG against weak spots by 30%.
refinement_effect.refine_three: Increases DMG against weak spots by 36%.
refinement_effect.refine_four: Increases DMG against weak spots by 42%.
refinement_effect.refine_five: Increases DMG against weak spots by 48%.

description: This superior bow once belonged to a master archer. However, it gives off a strong scent, thus making it unsuitable for hunting.
